task_prompt: 创建散点图，其中横轴表示出勤率，纵轴表示成绩，以探索学生出勤率与成绩关系
send_prompt:
您对 Linux 操作系统非常熟悉。您的任务是操作计算机屏幕，完成指定的任务。
您现在的目标是操作计算机屏幕，视频宽度：1024，视频高度：768，总体目标是 "创建散点图，其中横轴表示出勤率，纵轴表示成绩，以探索学生出勤率与成绩关系"。

我们为这个总体目标制定了一个实施计划：

    1. 选种Score和Attendance Rate(%)两列

    2. 找到插入图表按钮

    3. 打开插入图表

    4. 找到散点图

    5. 选中第一个散点图类型

    6. 点击下一步

    7. 选中Data series in columns

    8. 勾选First row as label

    9. 点击下一步

    10. 点击下一步

    11. 选中Title输入框

    12. 输入“学生出勤率与成绩关系”

    13. 点击完成按钮


现在的子任务是 "选中Title输入框"。
您可以使用鼠标和键盘，可选择的操作有：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"double_click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_up","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_down","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"move","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"drag","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"KeyName in keysymdef"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Ctrl+A"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text": "Hello, world!"},
    {"action_type":"WaitAction","wait_time":float}
]
```
其中，鼠标的位置是相对于屏幕左上角的坐标，键盘的按键请参考 [keysymdef.h]。

请输出执行动作，请以 json 格式输出您的动作，例如：
我的计划是点击左下角的开始按钮，因此我的操作将是：
```json 
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":10,"height":760}}
]
```

另一个例子，我的计划是打开记事本，我看到屏幕上有Mousepad，因此我的操作将是：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Super_L"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_text":"notepad"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Return"}
]
```


现在的子任务是 "选中Title输入框"，请根据现有屏幕图像的状态给出详细的下一步操作。
LLM_response:
根据现有屏幕图像的状态，我们需要选择Title输入框。在这个屏幕上，我们可以看到一个输入框，位于屏幕左下角。我们可以使用鼠标和键盘进行操作。

在这个情况下，我们的计划是使用鼠标点击输入框，因此我们的操作将是：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":10,"height":760}}
]
```
这将选中Title输入框，并将其内容设置为“学生出勤率与成绩关系”。
LLM_response_editer:
根据现有屏幕图像的状态，我们需要选择Title输入框。在这个屏幕上，我们可以看到一个输入框，因此我们的操作将是：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":514,"height":234}}
]
```
这将选中Title输入框。
task_prompt_en: Create a scatter chart, where the horizontal axis represents the attendance rate and the vertical axis represents the score to explore the relationship between student attendance rate and score
task_prompt_zh: 创建散点图，其中横轴表示出勤率，纵轴表示成绩，以探索学生出勤率与成绩关系
send_prompt_en:
You are familiar with the Linux operating system. Your task is to operate the computer screen and complete the specified task.
Your current goal is to operate the computer screen. The video width is 1024 and the video height is 768. The overall goal is to "create a scatter chart, where the horizontal axis represents the attendance rate and the vertical axis represents the score, so as to explore the relationship between student attendance rate and score".
We have formulated an implementation plan for this overall goal:
1. Select two columns: Score and Attendance Rate (%)
2. Find the Insert Chart button
3. Open Insert Chart
4. Find the scatter plot
5. Select the first scatter chart type
6. Click Next
7. Select Data series in columns
8. Check First row as label
9. Click Next
10. Click Next
11. Check the Title input box
12. Enter "Relationship between student attendance rate and performance"
13. Click the Finish button
The current subtask is "Select the Title Input Box".
You can use the mouse and keyboard. The operations you can select are:```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"double_click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_up","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_down","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"move","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"drag","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"KeyName in keysymdef"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Ctrl+A"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text": "Hello, world!"},
    {"action_type":"WaitAction","wait_time":float}
]
```The position of the mouse is the coordinate relative to the upper left corner of the screen. For keyboard keys, see [keysymdef. h].
Please output the execution action. Please output your action in json format, for example:
My plan is to click the Start button at the bottom left corner, so my operation will be:```json
[
    {"action_type": "MouseAction", "mouse_action_type": "click", "mouse_button": "left", "mouse_position": {"width": 10, "height": 760}}
]
```Another example, my plan is to open notepad. I see Mousepad on the screen, so my operation will be:```json
[
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Super_L"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "notepad"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Return"}
]
```The current subtask is "Select the Title Input Box". Please give detailed next steps according to the status of the existing screen image.
